page.title: 12LIFE OF BECKY (continued)
page.content: for pudding chocolate sponge and custard. After lunch we have another playtime. We go up on our gardens and pull out the weeds. Then at 1.15 p.m. we go back to our class, we do some more Mathematics and then some of our topic. Mr. Dunn reads us some of the book the Demon Headmaster. The bell rings again at 3.30 p.m. At 3.30 p.m. Mum collects me from school. I go home and clean my pony's stable out, then I take my dog Ben for a walk across the fields. At 4.45p.m. I get my pony in from the field and groom him. When Dad comes home from work he takes me out on a ride on Jumbo, he rides his postman's bike. When we come home Mum makes some tea for my sister Lisa and my Dad and myself. After tea I watch TV for a while then I go to bed at 9 p.m.
